definitions: the quality of being awkward or careless in one's movements

examples.text: in an impressive display of clumsiness, I managed to spill peppermint tea on my desk

shortDefinitions: quality of being awkward or careless

definitions: the quality of being done in a way that lacks skill or finesse

examples.text: the telltale clumsiness of the amateur
the sheer clumsiness of the ploy made it sure to be uncovered

shortDefinitions: quality of being done in way that lacks skill or finesse

definitions: the quality of being tactless and lacking social skills
shortDefinitions: quality or being tactless and lacking social skills
